properties.description: Warm Space, open all day, and to all! We are offering a warm community space where you are welcome to come and make use of our facilities. Whether that be a few games of pool or darts, board games, access to our IT suite, a few games of FIFA on our XBOX, or just a nice friendly chat. We are here for you! Food served in 2 sittings of Lunch (12-2), Dinner (3-5), all free of charge and with takeaway options available
